revised_title: On the Bodily Tides of Viscous and Semi-elastic Spheroids and Ocean Tides on a Yielding Nucleus
tldr: The author investigates the bodily tides of viscous and semi-elastic spheroids and their impact on ocean tides, considering the earth's interior as a viscous or imperfectly elastic medium. The study provides insights into the rigidity of the earth's crust and the behavior of ocean tides under these conditions.
